api_integration_default.preamble: Implement API integration with authentication, error handling, and retry logic. Include request/response logging, rate limiting, and comprehensive error recovery.

database_ops_default.preamble: Execute database operations including schema creation, migrations, and query optimization. Ensure data integrity, implement proper indexing, and include rollback procedures.

deployment_default.preamble: Deploy application with zero-downtime strategy. Include health checks, rollback procedures, and monitoring setup. Validate deployment and perform smoke tests.

monitoring_setup_default.preamble: Set up comprehensive monitoring including metrics collection, log aggregation, and alerting rules. Create dashboards for different stakeholders and define SLIs/SLOs.

version_control_default.preamble: Execute version control operations including branching, merging, and tagging. Resolve conflicts, maintain clean history, and follow defined branching strategy.
